subTag.Description: Portuguese-Brazilian Orthographic Convention of 1945 (Convenção Ortográfica Luso-Brasileira de 1945)
subTag.Comments: Portuguese orthography conventions established in 1945, generally in effect until 2009. This reform was not ratified in Brazil.
